intro.heading: Building stable backends at scale
intro.summary: I specialize in building performant software and making complex systems simple.
paragraphs: With over 12 years of experience across Web3, automotive, health care, media, and commerce, I focus on stability, scale, and speed.
Currently, I am heading the backend infrastructure at Tilt, keeping livestream auctions, payments, and fulfillment fast and reliable.

Outside of the terminal, my life revolves around family, health, and sound money. I am a proud father of two, an active fitness enthusiast (football, padel, gym, cycling), and a firm believer that Bitcoin can change the world for the better.
I remain curious and focused on the future. My current goals are achieving financial independence, building impactful personal products, and traveling the world with my wife and kids.

work.heading: How I help teams win
work.description: My sweet spot is taking ambiguous roadmaps and shaping the backend architecture, delivery practices, and team habits that make them real.

capabilityAreas.title: Commerce systems that scale
capabilityAreas.intro: Design end-to-end flows for livestream shopping, auctions, fulfillment, and payouts that feel instant to operators.
points: Grew revenue-critical services at Tilt while keeping customer-facing latency under 150ms.
Scaled ad-tech pipelines past 1.7B impressions by tightening ingestion, batching, and observability.

capabilityAreas.title: Delivery with guardrails
capabilityAreas.intro: Blend architecture decisions with day-to-day execution so teams ship confidently without gambling uptime.
points: Pair roadmap planning with instrumentation, runbooks, and feedback loops that keep teams close to customers.
Coach engineers through migrations and incident reviews so lessons stick across the org.

capabilityAreas.title: Founder-aligned partnership
capabilityAreas.intro: Work shoulder-to-shoulder with founders from first build through hypergrowth stages.
points: Translate business pressure into scoped delivery cycles and crisp investment trade-offs.
Navigate legacy stacks and third-party dependencies without slowing velocity.

highlightedWork.name: Tilt
highlightedWork.summary: Scaling the backend powering Tilt's interactive commerce—from livestream auctions to payments and personalization—while shaping API design, reliability, and engineering rituals.

highlightedWork.name: ReneVerse
highlightedWork.summary: Architected event-driven infrastructure for interoperable blockchain gaming assets and ad tech, scaling to billions of impressions with strict uptime targets.

journey.heading: Trajectory
journey.summary: From on-site enterprise delivery to remote founder partnerships, the through-line has been building systems people can trust.

stops.headline: Foundation in shipping
stops.summary: Clocked over 3,000 hours of hands-on development while finishing my computer science degree—shipping early-stage web and mobile products, learning production discipline, and keeping commitments to real users.

stops.headline: Enterprise and automotive craft
stops.summary: Engineering roles with Ericsson, Profico, and Rimac. Led distributed systems work, integrated legacy platforms, and introduced safer delivery practices across automotive and telco teams.

stops.headline: Remote partner to founders
stops.summary: Embedded with Povio, ReneVerse, CryptoToday, and Tilt. Scaled blockchain-first products, reinforced event-driven pipelines, and now guide Tilt's interactive commerce backend.

life.heading: Beyond the keyboard
life.summary: My life revolves around family, software, and fitness. Sound money keeps the long-term view honest.

focusAreas.title: Family first
focusAreas.description: Two kids, school runs, and evening routines ground every decision. Work flexes around their milestones.

focusAreas.title: Movement as fuel
focusAreas.description: Football, padel, gym, cycling, and short daily sessions keep the system balanced.

focusAreas.title: Sound money
focusAreas.description: Bitcoin is the highest signal macro trend I follow. I keep my personal and product decisions aligned with that reality.

principles.heading: Operating principles
items: Build systems that disappear into the background and let people focus on their craft.
Make architecture decisions with the teammates who own the day-two reality.
Document, mentor, and leave every team with healthier defaults than I found.

training.heading: Training snapshot
training.summary: Autumn focus: reclaim conditioning while protecting long-term joints. Consistency beats intensity.
